string.text: Surgical Instruments

Small variation of surgical instrument which are common in the zone. They are used to craft the CMS kit. Can be directly used, but it will require a bandage and the instruments aren't sterile anymore. So they can be used only one time.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] small kit to recover bodyparts
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] crafting item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] surgical item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] you will have to hurt yourself within the medical intervention
Zagustin

Military issue drug. Inhibitis activators of profibinolysin and slows down its transformation in fibrinolysin. Temporarily stops bleeding and increases resistance to bloodloss. Has side effects. Leads to severe dehydration.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stops bleeding fast
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Army Bandage

An elastic army bandage used to stop bleeding and prevent infection of wounds. For regular bleeding, carefully apply the bandage to the wound. For arterial bleeding, urgently tie the bandage around the affected area.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stops bleeding
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (adhesive plaster)
Propital

Military issue drug. It stimulates regeneration processes by increasing the biosynthesis of purine and pyrimidine bases, RNA, functional and enzymatic cell elements. Increases metabolism, health and vitality. It has long-term side effects. Permitted to use only by medical officers and paramedics.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
SJ6 Labs Combat Stimulant Injector

Combat stimulant. Mixed with a small amount of adrenalin it is used to increase the body abilities before combat for about 3 minutes. The stimulant is allowed to use by the special forces units. Develeped by Svarog Test Labs, marked as SJ6. Has side effects. Not recommended for use in psy-active zones
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] freshens you up
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] very good damage resistance bonus (20%)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] very good carryweight bonus
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] very good stamina bonus
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] long duration
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes hallucinations but strenghtens the mind
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] greatly increases hunger
SJ1 Labs Combat Stimulant Injector

Combat stimulant. Is used for gaining strength and endurance before combat for about 3 minutes. Stimulant is allowed to use by the special forces units. Develeped by Svarog Test Labs, marked as SJ1. Has side effects. Not recommended for use in psy-active zones
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] freshens you up
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] good damage resistance bonus (15%)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] good carryweight bonus
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] very good stamina bonus
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] long duration
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes hallucinations but strenghtens the mind
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] increases hunger
CMS surgical kit

Compact surgical kit for treatment of bullet wounds and other serious injuries. Unlike surgical tools will also restore some lost HP too after restoring the limb.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] surgical item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
Analgin painkillers

The most cheap and widely spread painkillers.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] painkillers
Splint

Common splint for fixing the damaged bones in positions as an emergency aid measure.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[0,255,255,255] heals broken bones 
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast and permanent
Alu splint

Common splint for fixing the damaged bones in positions as an emergency aid measure.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] heals broken bones
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast and permanent
eTG-Change

Pen injector which contains a mix of different steroids and other ingredients. Guess nobody wants to know exactly what is in it. The main point is that it works.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] greatly increased carryweight
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] very good stamina bonus
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] very long duration
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] greatly increases hunger
